Package Controller

Class RegistrationSystemController

java.lang.Object
Controller.RegistrationSystemController
public class RegistrationSystemController extends Object
the RegistrationSystemController class has the following functionalities sorting students by their last name,sorting courses by name filter student/courses after credit enrolling a student to a course retrieving courses with available places deleting a course from the teachers and students course list,updating the credit score of a student after the course was deleted deleting the enrollment for the deleted course getting all students enrolled for a course,getting all courses,finding a course,finding a student,finding a teacher, saving the data to database
Since:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • register

      public boolean register(Student student, Course course) throws InputException, NullException
      the methode registers a student to a curse, and adds the course to the students courses
      Parameters:
      student - -student to be registered for a course , student must not be null
      course - -course to which the student wants to register, course must not be null
      Returns:
      true- if the student was registered to the course or false - if there aren't places available for the course or if the student already has 30 credits
      Throws:
      InputException
      NullException
